name: A Way Home (azizysgame)
description:
Home is the network you build; the connections you make that support you and the strands that connect you to your world. Bring artifacts from worlds you've connected with to new planets to build bridges between them. Explore the galaxy and bring planets into your community.

Made by: Aidan Zizys, Robert Ward, Michael Chong, Diego Gregori, and Ryan Thorne
